item.title: Manga Update: Chapter 10 "Fools Trick" (Part 1)
item.description: Chapter 10 "Fools Trick" (Part 1) of Genshin Impact's official manga will be updated on September 6th, 5:00 PM (GMT-7).

item.title: Servers Down for Update Maintenance on 10/22
item.description: To bring you the best-possible Genshin Impact experience and fix some known issues, the developers will soon perform version update maintenance, during which the servers will be down.
item.content:encoded:
To bring you the best-possible Genshin Impact experience and fix some known issues, the developers will soon perform version update maintenance, during which the servers will be down.

Read more on Servers Down for Update Maintenance on 10/22

item.title: How to Unlock the Astrolabos Chapter Quest
item.description: Once Travelers have reached the required Adventure Rank and completed the prerequisite quests, they may use a Story Key to unlock Mona's story quest, the Astrolabos Chapter.
item.content:encoded:
Once Travelers have reached the required Adventure Rank and completed the prerequisite quests, they may use a Story Key to unlock Mona's story quest, the Astrolabos Chapter.

Read more on How to Unlock the Astrolabos Chapter Quest

item.title: Marvelous Merchandise Event Details
item.description: The Marvelous Merchandise event is available for a limited time, and the corresponding missions have been added to the Battle Pass.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Version 1.1 "A New Star Approaches": About Reputation and Exploration Progress
